about_the_game:
The town of Riverwood has seen better days. Now it slowly withers away, surrounded by endless fields and drowned in thick shadows. Time seems to stand still, and nothing seems able to awaken the fading life in the decaying houses and gloomy people.

In the midst of this seemingly immutable routine, a few teenagers are faced with an unimaginable horror that enters their minds and takes on the most hideous forms. The nightmare will last forever, devouring one victim after another, unless the protagonists unravel the mystery behind their misadventures.

This is the first of the planned chapters. We expect to release five episodes in total, which one by one will plunge you into new depths of horror.



Game features

- Voice acting from famous dubbing actors such as Konstantin Karasik, Eliza Martirosova and others;
- Painted graphics and colourful character animation;
- Ability to influence the plot, choose the fate of the main characters;
- Branching, non-linear narrative;
- A mesmerising soundtrack that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and mystery;
- Interactive interaction and mini-games;
- Retro atmosphere of the 90s.

Content Notes

The game may contain content not intended for all ages: violent and violent scenes, content for adult audiences.

name: Pink Noise Demo
short_description: "Pink Noise" is a visual novel in the genre of psychological horror in the retro atmosphere of the 90s. Following the tradition of "summer horror", it will tell you a unique story about several teenagers who by chance encounter unknown forces.
